overview:
Jonathan Abshagen is the Senior Portfolio Analyst for GF Private Equity Group. He provides investment analysis and research for direct investments in companies as well as fund investments. In addition, he helps to manage accounting, valuation and cash flow management. He also performs due diligence, assists with the acquisition process and monitors existing investments. He is currently a director of Madison Grey and a board observer of VeraLight.

Mr. Abshagen previously worked for Price Waterhouse Coopers as an accountant and auditor of private equity and venture capital funds, early stage technology companies and large semiconductor manufacturers.

Mr. Abshagen holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Business Administration with an emphasis in finance and accounting from the Leeds School of Business at the University of Colorado at Boulder.
